cards.title: The Knight
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card now.
Reduce damage dealt to 1 target by 1 until the start of your next turn.
Increase damage dealt by 1 target by 1 until the start of your next turn.

openingLines.default: Halt, villain! Leave, or cross my steel!
openingLines.OutlanderCharacter: There is no honor in one who prospers from the death of others. Whatever you once were, I see nothing of myself left in you now.
openingLines.WinterTiamatCharacter: Foul Beast! I have slain thee once, I will do so again.
openingLines.HydraWinterTiamatCharacter: No matter how many heads this beast returns with, I shall vanquish it again!
openingLines.FutureTiamatCharacter: The dragon's armor appears even stronger than my own.

cards.title: Arm Yourself
cards.body: Select up to 2 Equipment cards from your trash. Put one into play and one into your hand.

flavorQuotes.text: One might not see the claws of the{BR}bear, but they are never far.

cards.title: Battlefield Scavenger
cards.body: Each player may draw a card, or take an Equipment or Ongoing card from their trash and put it on top of their deck.

flavorQuotes.text: I have a great respect for{BR}crows. They do not waste anything. Or{BR}nest on my head.

cards.flavorReference: The Stranger, Book of the Dead #578

flavorQuotes.text: A moment, and I will attend you.

cards.title: Champion of the Realm
body: Search your deck for a Single Hand Equipment card and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.
Select a hero target. Until the start of your next turn, increase damage dealt by that target by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: I did not think to{BR}set eyes on you again.

cards.flavorReference: Lady Of The Wood, The Wanderer's Requiem #146

cards.title: Defender of the Realm
body: Search your deck for a copy of “Plate Mail” or “Plate Helm” and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.
Select a hero target. Until the start of your next turn, reduce damage dealt to that target by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: They don't make{BR}'em like they used to.

cards.title: Knight's Honor
body: Play this card next to a target.
Whenever that target would take damage, redirect that damage to {TheKnight}. Damage redirected this way is irreducible.

cards.title: Maiden's Blessing
powers: You may play an Equipment card. Draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: I have an oath to uphold,

cards.title: Plate Helm
body: When this card enters play, you may draw a card.
When {TheKnight} would be dealt damage, you may redirect that damage to this card.
cards.flavorText: The Knight donned his helm,{BR}and The Scholar his sunglasses.{BR}“Ready.”

cards.title: Plate Mail
cards.body: When {TheKnight} would be dealt damage, you may redirect that damage to this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Forgive me, I do not{BR}hail from this place.

cards.title: Short Sword
body: When this card is put into play, destroy all but 2 Single Hand Equipment cards.

cards.title: Stalwart Shield
body: When this card is put into play, destroy all but 2 Single Hand Equipment cards.
Reduce damage taken by {TheKnight} and your Equipment cards by 1.

cards.title: Sure Footing

flavorQuotes.text: Okay, he's the only one here{BR}allowed to run with scissors.

powers: You may play a one-shot now. Draw a card.

cards.title: Swift Strikes
cards.body: {TheKnight} deals up to 2 targets 1 melee damage each.

flavorQuotes.text: Suprise is not something one{BR}shouts, it is something one embodies.

cards.flavorReference: The Knight, A Life in a Day One Shot

cards.title: Whetstone
cards.body: Increase melee damage dealt by {TheKnight} by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: A warrior is only as good as his{BR}equipment.

cards.title: The Old Knight
powers: {TheOldKnightCharacter} deals 1 target 2 irreducible lightning damage. Return 1 of your equipment cards in play to your hand.
cards.flippedBody: When {TheOldKnightCharacter} flips to this side, destroy all equipment cards next to him.

cards.title: The Young Knight
powers: {TheYoungKnightCharacter} deals herself and 2 other targets 2 toxic damage each
cards.flippedBody: When {TheYoungKnightCharacter} flips to this side, destroy all equipment cards next to her.

promoCards.title: The Knight
powers: {TheKnight} and all her targets regain 2 HP.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card now.
One player may draw a card now.
Until the start of your next turn, reduce damage dealt by environment cards to hero targets by 2.

openingLines.default: Have at thee! I've always wanted to say that.
openingLines.OutlanderCharacter: And you are nothing but a broken reflection of my ancestor.
openingLines.FutureTiamatCharacter: Is that thing from the future?

promoCards.title: The Knight
powers: Destroy an equipment target. {TheKnight} deals 1 target X psychic damage, where X is the HP of the equipment before it was destroyed plus 1.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card now.
Increase all damage by 1 until the start of your next turn.
One target deals itself 1 psychic damage.

openingLines.default: Whether 'tis by my blood and bone alone, today shall be your undoing!
openingLines.OutlanderCharacter: I will not stand down while I yet draw breath.
openingLines.HydraWinterTiamatCharacter: Each of those necks shall feel my blade!
openingLines.FutureTiamatCharacter: An armored dragon! What a sight!

promoCards.title: The Knight
powers: Play an equipment target next to a hero. Treat {TheKnight}'s name on that equipment as the name of the hero it is next to.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card now.
Reveal the top card of the villain deck, then replace it.
Select a target, increase the next damage dealt to and by that target by 2.

openingLines.default: You will not shed innocent blood while we stand.
openingLines.OutlanderCharacter: The tale is long, but the ending is simple: your defeat, at my blade.
openingLines.PastTheRamCharacter: A sword, and my honor. You shall not destroy this city.
openingLines.WinterTiamatCharacter: Hold fast! We will smite this serpent where it stands.
openingLines.HydraWinterTiamatCharacter: Stand fast; this will be a fearsome onslaught.
openingLines.TheMistressOfFateCharacter: Whatever sorcery this is, I have faced worse.
openingLines.FutureTiamatCharacter: I have never seen a dragon such as this.

promoCards.title: The Knight
setup: At the start of the game, put the character cards for the Young and Old Knights into play, active side up.
Shuffle the hero deck and draw 4 cards.
gameplay: If you have no hero character targets in play, flip this card.
When 1 of your equipment cards enter play, put it next to 1 of your active knights.

When your cards refer to “The Knight”, choose 1 of your active knights. For equipment cards, you must choose the knight they are next to. Stalwart Shield does not reduce damage to the other knight's equipment targets.
Whenever an equipment card enters play next to The Young Knight, she deals 1 target 1 toxic damage.
Whenever an equipment card enters play next to The Old Knight, draw a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero deals 1 target 1 projectile damage.
One player may discard a card to play 2 cards now.

openingLines.default: We survived the Wastelands; this should be easy!
openingLines.OutlanderCharacter: Well, you'll have to keep wondering!
openingLines.WinterTiamatCharacter: I have seen worse horrors than you!
openingLines.HydraWinterTiamatCharacter: We've visited the future and seen your bones. You don't frighten us!
openingLines.FutureTiamatCharacter: These monsters are not flesh and blood; don't hold back!
